title: Test detects COVID (and which variant) in about 15 minutes
content: A new test that uses a simple heating device and cellphone can tell within 10-15 minutes if you have COVID, and if so, which of the five variants you have.
description: A new test that uses a simple heating device and cellphone can tell within 10-15 minutes if you have COVID, and if so, which of the five variants you have.
